inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "horn_coral", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft the leather horse armor, I need to place three leather in a row. Therefore, I will first move one leather from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: leather_horse_armor
inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 6, "index": 24}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "horn_coral", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]
thought: Next, I will move another leather from slot 24 to slot 3. This will place the leather side by side in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 3 with quantity 1

thought: Finally, I will move the third piece of leather from slot 24 to slot 4. This will complete the recipe for the leather horse armor.
Ok

Ok
